directory.description: The absolute or relative path to an output directory where allure result files will be written.

links.description: An array containing link patterns. Each pattern must contain a link type placeholder in the form of {link-type}.

failExceptions.description: The list of exceptions that make a test failed instead of broken. Each entry must be a namespace-qualified class name.

items.description: The full class name of an exception type.

useLegacyIds.description: Calculate fullNames, historyIds and uuids compatible with ones generated by the versions prior to 2.10.

indentOutput.description: If set to true, the output JSON files (*-result.json, *-container.json) will be indented to be more readable
